description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Combine the elements to uncover the pixel symbol of each level. Test your dexterity and wit against spell-crafting witches, mysterious aliens, powerful vampires, immortal mummies and swashbuckling pirates in story mode. Or, play in arcade mode for some undisturbed score-breaking action. Are you up to the challenge?
